title: @Riot Please put back the feature where the champs taunt played when they got picked!
body: It seriously adds so much fun to champ select which is boring and long on its own.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, they removed it because apparently people were not hearing the "their turn to pick" notification over them talking, which lead to a lot of game dodges.

They even said that the number of them dropped when it was turned off.
It would be great if I could have an option to enable it. I thought it was really fun, and typically made me excited for games as they launched.

I found it extremely annoying whenever somebody picked rek'sai or karthus. 

If they were to return that feature they need new lines or a mute option.

I hadn't really noticed they turned it off. I usually listen to music or chat while I league. It was really cool hearing them go off, and if you weren't paying attention, that was your fault. I know queue times are long, and I get alot of reading done while playing League, but when it switches to the champ select screen, you shouldn't be tabbing out. There's enough visual cues for you to see when you pick your champ anyway. That's a lame ass excuse.

Edit: too many anyways.
